list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Clipboard Landing Page
list.description: A responsive landing page with a clean design, built using HTML and CSS. Features a sticky navigation bar and smooth scrolling.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Dark Mode Game
list.description: A simple game with a dark mode toggle, demonstrating the use of JavaScript to manipulate CSS styles and create interactive elements.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Dice Challenge Game
list.description: A two-player dice game where players roll dice and the highest roller wins. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for game logic and dynamic content updates.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Digital Clock with Date
list.description: A dynamic digital clock displaying the current time and date, updated in real-time using JavaScript's date and time functions.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Drum Kit Challenge
list.description: An interactive drum kit simulator that plays sounds when keys are pressed. Utilizes JavaScript for event handling and audio playback.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Google Sign-In Clone
list.description: A recreation of the Google sign-in page using HTML and CSS, focusing on replicating the layout and design elements.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Hangman Game
list.description: A classic hangman word-guessing game built with JavaScript.  Players guess letters to reveal a hidden word before the hangman figure is complete.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Love Calculator
list.description: A fun love calculator that calculates a compatibility score between two names using a simple algorithm implemented in JavaScript.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Interactive Quiz App
list.description: A quiz application with multiple-choice questions and scoring functionality, built using JavaScript for dynamic question handling and user interaction.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Random Quote Generator
list.description: A web app that displays random quotes fetched from an API. Uses JavaScript for asynchronous data fetching and DOM manipulation.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Simon Memory Game
list.description: A classic Simon memory game where players repeat a sequence of lights and sounds. Implemented using JavaScript for game logic, timing, and user input.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
list.description: A classic Tic-Tac-Toe game for two players, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to handle game logic and determine the winner.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: To-Do List Application
list.description: A simple to-do list app that allows users to add, remove, and mark tasks as complete. Uses JavaScript for DOM manipulation and local storage to save tasks.

list.author: D.EVIL DEV
list.title: Weather App
list.description: A weather application that fetches weather data from an API and displays it to the user. Utilizes JavaScript for API calls, data processing, and dynamic content updates.

thumbnail.title: Clipboard Landing Page
thumbnail.description: Responsive landing page with sticky navigation.

thumbnail.title: Dark Mode Game
thumbnail.description: Simple game with a dark mode toggle.

thumbnail.title: Dice Challenge Game
thumbnail.description: Two-player dice game with dynamic updates.

thumbnail.title: Random Quote Generator
thumbnail.description: Displays random quotes from an API.

thumbnail.title: Simon Memory Game
thumbnail.description: Classic Simon memory game with lights and sounds.

thumbnail.title: To-Do List Application
thumbnail.description: Add, remove, and mark tasks as complete.

about.para: A passionate and creative web developer with a focus on front-end development. I have a strong understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Sveltekit, Next.js, Tailwind, Express.js, and Node.js. I also have some experience with design tools like Canva, Photoshop, and Figma.

My passion for video games drives me to create interactive and engaging web experiences. I'm always looking for ways to incorporate innovative design elements and user-friendly interactions into my work.
A highly creative and detail-oriented individual with a strong work ethic. I'm also a quick learner and can adapt to new technologies and frameworks quickly.

My career goal is to continue to develop my skills and work on challenging and exciting projects in the field of web development. I'm particularly interested in working on projects that involve creating interactive experiences for users.
